gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Global Climate [in "State of the Climate in 2019"]

gmd:individualName.gco:CharacterString: van der Schalie, Robin, VanderSat B.V.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Global Climate is one chapter from the State of the Climate in 2019 annual report. Compiled by NOAA’s National Centers for Environmental Information, State of the Climate in 2019 is based on contributions from scientists from around the world. It provides a detailed update on global climate indicators, notable weather events, and other data collected by environmental monitoring stations and instruments located on land, water, ice, and in space.
